headers: PM BRIEF TEMPLATE — WHAT THE PM SENDS EACH EXPERT

rows.PM BRIEF TEMPLATE — WHAT THE PM SENDS EA: Copy this template for each expert session. Fill in the specifics.
TO: [Expert Name]
FROM: [PM Name], Studio 4
RE: Review of [Model Name] — [X] tabs covering [domain description]
CONTEXT:
We're building a comprehensive operational model for launching a D2C electrolyte supplement.
The model has 41 operating sub-models covering every business domain.
Your domain is [domain]. We've used AI to generate a first draft of [X] tabs.
We need 30-60 minutes of your time to tell us what's wrong, what's missing, and what's good.
WHAT WE'RE SENDING YOU:
[X] tabs from our operating model, covering: [list of tab names]
WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU:
1. Scan each tab (don't read every cell — scan for structure and content quality)
2. For each tab, rate: Expert-Grade / Acceptable / Needs Work / Embarrassing
3. Flag anything that's factually wrong or would make you lose credibility
4. Flag anything that's missing that a professional in this field would expect
5. Tell us what surprised you positively (so we know what AI does well)
YOU DO NOT NEED TO:
- Fix anything yourself
- Write any content
- Fill any blanks
- Spend more than 60 minutes
FORMAT:
You can do this live on a call (we'll take notes) or async (just reply to this email with notes).
Whatever is easier for you.
COMPENSATION:
[Option A: $X flat fee for the session]
[Option B: Access to the finished Trade model when complete]
[Option C: Trade for equivalent advisory time in your area of interest]
TIMELINE:
We'd like to schedule this for [week of X]. Does [date/time] work?
